description: The output from the async API call.

completed_at.description: The time and date the file conversion was completed.
completed_at.title: DateTime

created_at.description: The time and date the file conversion was created.
created_at.title: DateTime

error.description: The error the function returned, if any.

id.description:
The unique identifier of the file conversion.

This is the same as the API call ID.

output.description: The converted file, if completed, base64 encoded.
output.title: String

output_format.description: The output format of the file conversion.

src_format.description: The source format of the file conversion.

started_at.description: The time and date the file conversion was started.
started_at.title: DateTime

status.description: The status of the file conversion.

updated_at.description: The time and date the file conversion was last updated.
updated_at.title: DateTime

user_id.description: The user ID of the user who created the file conversion.
